auto_merge.commit_message:
It isn't available in the Limited API without an extra include (just because
the Limited API includes slightly different headers than the full API).

Using `Py_FatalError()` seems the most descriptive way of fixing it.
auto_merge.commit_title: Remove use of C abort function (GH-6918)

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
It isn't available in the Limited API without an extra include (just because the Limited API includes slightly different headers than the full API).

Using `Py_FatalError` seems the most descriptive way of fixing it.

comment_data.body: If this case really ever happens and we output this message, this will be the unhelpful bug report that we get. We'd help ourselves if we put at least some relevant information in there. The name of the type that we're trying to map here should be easy to add, the sizes might be difficult.

commit.message:
Remove use of C abort function

It isn't available in the Limited API without an extra include (just because the Limited API includes slightly different headers than the full API).

Using `Py_FatalError` seems the most descriptive way of fixing it.
